title: A Man for all seasons [a discussion]
creator_credit: Country Education Project and Daryl Wayland
brief_description: Bolt’s play, set in Tudor England in the 16th century, concentrates on the battle for Tomas More’s conscience and his loyalty. Dennis O’Hearn of Melbourne University discusses the character of More, his relationships with other characters and his historical background to the play.
